title: Auth0 Logs to Mixpanel
name: auth0-logs-to-mixpanel
description: This extension will take all of your Auth0 logs and export them to Mixpanel

MIXPANEL_TOKEN.description: Mixpanel Token - this is your Mixpanel Token for your mixpanel project

MIXPANEL_KEY.description: Mixpanel Key - this is your Mixpanel Key for your mixpanel project

BATCH_SIZE.description: The amount of logs to be read on each execution. Maximum is 20.
